Title: Polearms
Description:
Adds polearms: Poleaxes, Pikes, and Glaives as well as the 'extended' mod that turns other weapons into polearms.

Polearms do additional damage on charges.

The polearms skill tree allows players to attack at a one square reach range, push away enemies during attacks, and wield polearms with two hands for additional damage.

You can find the code and report issues on this plugin at: https://github.com/acegiak/AshQudPolearms
